title: Google app's user data is too high. Is this normal ?
content: I bought a pixel 4a recently and have been using it for around 3 weeks now. I just wanted to clear unnecessary data. I was checking "Apps Storage" in Settings and I noticed that the "Google app" occupies around 1 GB. I was shocked. I investigated further to look at the breakup of the storage and user data is around 800 MB. Is this normal ? Just wanted to know if you guys see the same. I have attached a photo.
